channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It’s been a struggle getting payments from her’: I rent a house to our daughter. Do I just gift her the house?
item.description: “She would be responsible for taxes and insurance, which should be manageable.”

item.title: Online fury as betting market Polymarket denies Venezuela was invaded
item.description: If this isn’t an invasion, what is?

item.title: Nvidia just sent a message to rivals with its latest chip announcements
item.description: The chip maker’s approach to its Vera Rubin platform signals that competitors will have a hard time competing with standalone chips, Bernstein says.

item.title: The emerging-markets funds in your 401(k) just got a lot riskier
item.description: Half of the index is exposed in Taiwan and China.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
